title: 20 MIN LOWER BODY STRETCH for Recovery and Flexibility (Hamstrings, Butt, & Hips)
description:
Do this 20 minute lower body stretch #WithMe ! This is a quick routine that is focused mainly on the hips and hamstrings. Perfect for recovery/sore muscles and working on your flexibility!
#StretchRoutine #Yoga
⭐️ SHOP MY COOKBOOKS!: https://goo.gl/XHwUJg 

⭐️ DO THIS WARM UP FIRST: http://bit.ly/2riv8T6
⭐️ APARTMENT FRIENDLY WARM UP: https://bit.ly/2Bounwk
⭐️ DO THIS COOL DOWN AFTER (15 min): http://bit.ly/2YO55PP
⭐️ COOL DOWN (5 min): https://bit.ly/3hqWdbf

👉🏼THE MAT I USE (Exercise 6X4): http://gorillamats.com?aff=19  (MADFIT10 for 10% off)

channelDescription:
This is a place where I post REAL TIME, AT HOME workouts.
My goal is to help inspire everyone at all fitness levels to get up, get moving and reach their goals!
embedHtml: <iframe width="480" height="270" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/FN_X-WHcMF4" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
comments: Hope you guys enjoyed doing this lower body stretch with me! ❤️ Would you like to see more stretching videos? Leave your requests below! Xx - Maddie
I’m a dude who works out and never stretches... this is a workout itself for me!! Can’t believe how hard these stretches were!

I am not even being dramatic when I say this routine is life changing. I do weight lifting and feel like my legs are never not sore; they constantly hurt. I am constantly stretching, but this routine is so much more effective than anything I could come up with on my own.
This is the best stretching routine on the whole internet, I swear
Omg this was amazing!! You should do one for upper body too, specifically shoulders!! Thank you so much, this helped a ton :)
